Rocketry Team

The Rocketry Team builds and launches high-power rockets, pushing the boundaries of amateur rocketry and engineering.

Hydra Mini

Rocket project aimed at reaching new altitudes and testing avionics systems.

Development of advanced recovery systems for safe payload return.
